game.name: Void Fighters
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Void Fighters is a CO-OP/PvP game where you can fight alongside your friends or compete against other online players. You can also play the PvE mode solo or with friends. The PvE features an RPG story with dungeons, quests, skill trees, and character progression.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Void Fighters is a CO-OP/PvP game where you can fight alongside your friends or compete against other online players. You can also play the PvE mode solo or with friends. The PvE features an RPG story with dungeons, quests, skill trees, and character progression.
